thoughts.text: The 'duolingo' package is installed correctly. We can now modify the Python script we created earlier to include our Duolingo username and the language we want to learn. Then, we can use the 'execute_python_file' command to run the modified script. We could also use the 'write_to_file' command to save our language learning progress to a file for future reference.
